original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Paṇāmitavagga
analyzed: paṇāmita vagga

original: 2. Sabbasattahitapharaṇapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, tumhe bhaṇatha—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena tumhe bhaṇatha

original: ‘tathāgato sabbasattānaṁ ahitamapanetvā hitamupadahatī’ti.
analyzed: tathāgataḥ sabba sattānam ahitam apanetvā hitam upadahati iti

original: Puna ca bhaṇatha aggikkhandhūpame dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne ‘saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggatan’ti.
analyzed: puna ca bhaṇatha aggi kkhandha upame dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānam bhikkhūnam uṇham lohitam mukhataḥ uggatanti

original: Aggikkhandhūpamaṁ, bhante, dhammapariyāyaṁ desentena tathāgatena saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ hitamapanetvā ahitamupadahitaṁ.
analyzed: aggi khandha upama bhante dhammapariyāyam desentena tathāgatena saṭṭhimattānam bhikkhūnam hitam apanetvā ahitam upadahita

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgato sabbasattānaṁ ahitamapanetvā hitamupadahati, tena
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena tathāgataḥ sabba sattānam ahitam apanetvā hitam upadahati tena

original: hi aggikkhandhūpame dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ
analyzed: hi aggi khandha upame dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānam bhikkhūnam uṇham lohita

original: mukhato uggatanti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: mukhataḥ yam tam micchā

original: Yadi aggikkhandhūpame dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ
analyzed: yadi aggi kkhandha upame dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānam bhikkhūnam uṇham lohita

original: mukhato uggataṁ, tena hi tathāgato sabbasattānaṁ ahitamapanetvā hitamupadahatīti
analyzed: mukhataḥ uggata tena hi tathāgataḥ sabba sattānam ahitam apanetvā hitam upadahati iti

original: tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Tathāgato, mahārāja, sabbasattānaṁ ahitamapanetvā hitamupadahati, aggikkhandhūpame
analyzed: tathāgataḥ mahā rāja sabba sattānam ahitam apanetvā hitam upadahati aggi kkhandha upame

original: dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggataṁ,
analyzed: dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānam bhikkhūnam uṇham lohitam mukhataḥ uggata

original: tañca pana na tathāgatassa katena, tesaṁyeva attano katenā”ti.
analyzed: tat ca pana na tathāgatassa katena tesayā iva attano katena ati

original: “Yadi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgato aggikkhandhūpamaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ na bhāseyya, api nu tesaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggaccheyyā”ti.
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena tathāgataḥ aggi khandha upamam dhammapariyāyam na bhāseyya api nu tesam uṇham lohitam mukhataḥ uggaccheyya ati

original: “Na hi, mahārāja, micchāpaṭipannānaṁ tesaṁ bhagavato dhammapariyāyaṁ sutvā pariḷāho kāye uppajji, tena tesaṁ pariḷāhena uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggatan”ti.
analyzed: na hi mahā rāja micchā paṭipannānam tesam bhagavataḥ dhammapariyāyam sutvā pariḷāhaḥ kāye uppajji tena tesam pariḷāhena uṇham lohitam mukhataḥ uggatanti

original: “Tena hi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatasseva katena tesaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggataṁ,
analyzed: tena hi bhante nāgasena tathāgatassa iva katena tesam uṇham lohitam mukhataḥ

original: tathāgatoyeva tattha adhikāro tesaṁ nāsanāya, yathā nāma, bhante nāgasena, ahi vammikaṁ
analyzed: tathāgataḥ yeva tattha adhikāraḥ tesam na āsanāya yathā nāma bhante nāgasena ahi vammika

original: paviseyya, athaññataro paṁsukāmo puriso vammikaṁ bhinditvā paṁsuṁ hareyya, tassa
analyzed: paviseyya athaññataraḥ pasu kāmaḥ purisaḥ vammikam bhinditvā pasum hareyya tassa

original: paṁsuharaṇena vammikassa susiraṁ pidaheyya, atha tattheva so assāsaṁ alabhamāno mareyya,
analyzed: pasu haraṇena vammikassa susiram pidaheyya atha tattha iva saḥ assāsam a labhamānaḥ mareyya

original: nanu so, bhante, ahi tassa purisassa katena maraṇappatto”ti.
analyzed: nanu saḥ bhante ahi tassa purisassa katena maraṇa ppatto ti

original: “Āma, mahārājā”ti.
analyzed: āma mahārāja ati

original: “Evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatoyeva tattha adhikāro tesaṁ nāsanāyā”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante nāgasena tathāgataḥ yā iva tattha adhikāraḥ tesam na āsanāya ati

original: “Tathāgato, mahārāja, dhammaṁ desayamāno anunayappaṭighaṁ na karoti, anunayappaṭighavippamutto dhammaṁ deseti, evaṁ dhamme desīyamāne ye tattha sammāpaṭipannā, te bujjhanti.
analyzed: tathāgataḥ mahā rāja dhammam desayamānaḥ anunaya ppaṭigham na karoti anunaya ppaṭigha vippamuttaḥ dhammam deseti evam dhamme desīyamāne ye tattha sammā paṭipannā te bujjhanti

original: Ye pana micchāpaṭipannā, te patanti.
analyzed: ye pana micchā paṭipannā te patanti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, purisassa ambaṁ vā jambuṁ vā madhukaṁ vā cālayamānassa yāni tattha
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisassa ambam vā jambum vā madhukam vā cālayamānassa yāni

original: phalāni sārāni daḷhabandhanāni, tāni tattheva accutāni tiṭṭhanti, yāni tattha phalāni
analyzed: phalāni sārāni daḷha bandhanāni tāni tattha iva accutāni tiṭṭhanti yāni tattha phalāni

original: pūtivaṇṭamūlāni dubbalabandhanāni, tāni patanti;
analyzed: pūti vaṇṭa mūlāni dubbala bandhanāni tāni patanti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato dhammaṁ desayamāno anunayappaṭighaṁ na karoti, anunayappaṭighavippamutto
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ dhammam desayamānaḥ anunaya ppaṭigham na karoti anunaya ppaṭigha vippamuttaḥ

original: dhammaṁ deseti, evaṁ dhamme desīyamāne ye tattha sammāpaṭipannā, te bujjhanti.
analyzed: dhammaṃ deseti evam dhamme desīyamāne ye tattha sammāpaṭipannā te bujjhanti

original: Ye pana micchāpaṭipannā, te patanti.
analyzed: ye pana micchā paṭipannā te patanti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, kassako dhaññaṁ ropetukāmo khettaṁ kasati, tassa kasantassa anekasatasahassāni tiṇāni maranti;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja kassakaḥ dhaññam ropetu kāmo khettam kasati tassa kasantassa aneka sata sahassāni tiṇāni maranti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato paripakkamānase satte bodhento anunayappaṭighavippamutto dhammaṁ deseti, evaṁ dhamme desīyamāne ye tattha sammāpaṭipannā, te bujjhanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ paripakka mānase satte bodhentaḥ anunaya ppaṭigha vippamuttaḥ dhammam deseti evam dhamme desīyamāne ye tattha sammā paṭipannā te bujjhanti

original: Ye pana micchāpaṭipannā, te tiṇāni viya maranti.
analyzed: ye pana micchā paṭipannā te tiṇāni viya maranti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, manussā rasahetu yantena ucchuṁ pīḷayanti, tesaṁ ucchuṁ pīḷayamānānaṁ ye tattha yantamukhagatā kimayo, te pīḷiyanti;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja manussāḥ rasa hetu yantena ucchum pīḍayanti tesam ucchum pīḷayamānānam ye tattha yanta mukha gatā te

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato paripakkamānase satte bodhento dhammayantamabhipīḷayati, ye tattha micchāpaṭipannā, te kimī viya marantī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ paripakka mānase satte bodhentaḥ dhammayantam abhipīḍayati ye tattha micchā paṭipannā te kimī viya maranti iti

original: “Nanu, bhante nāgasena, te bhikkhū tāya dhammadesanāya patitā”ti?
analyzed: nanu bhante nāgasena te bhikkhū tāya dhamma desanāya patitā ati

original: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, tacchako rukkhaṁ tacchanto ujukaṁ parisuddhaṁ karotī”ti?
analyzed: api nu khalu mahā rāja tat śakaḥ rukkham tat śantaḥ ujukam parisuddham karoti iti

original: “Na hi, bhante, vajjanīyaṁ apanetvā tacchako rukkhaṁ ujukaṁ parisuddhaṁ karotī”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante vajjanīyam apanetvā tat śakaḥ rukkham ujukam parisuddham karoti iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato parisaṁ rakkhanto na sakkoti bodhaneyye satte bodhetuṁ,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ parisam rakkhantaḥ na sakkoti bodhaneyye satte bodhetu

original: micchāpaṭipanne pana satte apanetvā bodhaneyye satte bodheti, attakatena pana te,
analyzed: micchā paṭipanne pana satte apanetvā bodhaneyye satte bodheti atta katena pana te

original: mahārāja, micchāpaṭipannā patanti.
analyzed: mahā rāja micchā paṭipannāḥ patanti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, kadalī veḷu assatarī attajena haññati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kadalī veḷu assatarī attajena haññati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te micchāpaṭipannā, te attakatena haññanti patanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te micchā paṭipannā te atta katena haññanti patanti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, corā attakatena cakkhuppāṭanaṁ sūlāropanaṁ sīsacchedanaṁ pāpuṇanti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja corāḥ atta katena cakkhuppāṭanam sūla āropanam sīsa chedanam pāpuṇanti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te micchāpaṭipannā, te attakatena haññanti patanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te micchā paṭipannā te atta katena haññanti patanti

original: Yesaṁ, mahārāja, saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggataṁ, tesaṁ taṁ neva bhagavato katena, na paresaṁ katena, atha kho attanoyeva katena.
analyzed: mahā rāja saṭṭhimattānam bhikkhūnam uṇham lohitam mukhataḥ tesam tam na iva bhagavato katena na paresam katena atha kho attano yeva katena

original: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso sabbajanassa amataṁ dadeyya, te taṁ amataṁ asitvā arogā dīghāyukā
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisaḥ sabba janassa amatam dadeyya te tam amatam a sitvā arogāḥ dīgha āyukā

original: sabbītito parimucceyyuṁ, athaññataro puriso durupacārena taṁ asitvā maraṇaṁ pāpuṇeyya,
analyzed: sabbītitaḥ parimucceyyu athaññataraḥ puriso durupacārena tam a sitvā maraṇam pāpuṇeyya

original: api nu kho so, mahārāja, amatadāyako puriso tatonidānaṁ kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja amata dāyakaḥ puriso tatonidānam kiñci apuññam āpajjeyya ati

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā devamanussānaṁ amataṁ dhammadānaṁ deti, ye te sattā bhabbā, te dhammāmatena bujjhanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ dasa sahassiyā lokadhātuyā deva manussānam amatam dhamma dānam deti ye te sattā bhabbā te dhamma amatena bujjhanti

original: Ye pana te sattā abhabbā, te dhammāmatena haññanti patanti.
analyzed: ye pana te sattāḥ abhabbā te dhamma amatena haññanti patanti

original: Bhojanaṁ, mahārāja, sabbasattānaṁ jīvitaṁ rakkhati, tamekacce bhuñjitvā visūcikāya maranti, api nu kho so, mahārāja, bhojanadāyako puriso tatonidānaṁ kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
analyzed: bhojana mahā rāja sabba sattānam jīvitam rakkhati tam ekacce bhuñjitvā visūcikāya maranti api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja bhojana dāyakaḥ puriso tatonidānam kiñci apuññam āpajjeyya ati

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā devamanussānaṁ amataṁ dhammadānaṁ deti, ye te sattā bhabbā, te dhammāmatena bujjhanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ dasa sahassiyā lokadhātuyā deva manussānam amatam dhamma dānam deti ye te sattā bhabbā te dhamma amatena bujjhanti

original: Ye pana te sattā abhabbā, te dhammāmatena haññanti patantī”ti.
analyzed: ye pana te sattāḥ abhabbā te dhamma amatena haññanti patanti iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Sabbasattahitapharaṇapañho dutiyo.
analyzed: sabba satta hita pharaṇa pañhaḥ dutiyaḥ
